医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
步行对于降低死亡风险可能比之前认为的更有效根据对此进行的最大规模的调查分析，您每天应该步行的步数才能开始看到对您的健康的益处，这一数字比之前想象的要低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Walking-may-be-even-more- effective-than-previously-thought-at-reducing-risk-of-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Walking-may-be-even-more- effective-than-previously-thought-at-reducing-risk-of-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d808b720-9136-42cc-ace0-c465cf90664c Tue, 08 Aug 2023 22:27:32 -0400 Walking may be even more effective than previously thought at reducing risk of death
400 万美元奖金将帮助研究人员改善亚利桑那州消防员的睡眠健康美国国立卫生研究院下属的国家心肺血液研究所提供了 400 万美元的资助，亚利桑那大学梅尔和伊妮德祖克曼公共卫生学院的研究人员将能够确定成功实施工作场所预防措施的关键因素。睡眠指导可改善亚利桑那州消防员的睡眠健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/244-million-award-will-help-researchers-to-improve-sleep-health-in-Arizona-firefighters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/244-million-award-will-help-researchers-to-improve-sleep-health-in-Arizona-firefighters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7393de80-b098-4e30-b6ed-f0bc8313f82e Tue, 08 Aug 2023 22:18:02 -0400 $4 million award will help researchers to improve sleep health in Arizona firefighters
美国心脏协会资助研究评估心血管治疗算法中的种族偏见作为评估当前心血管治疗算法是否存在种族偏见的重点工作的一部分，美国心脏协会（美国心脏和大脑健康研究的最大非政府支持者）正在资助三个新的科学研究项目，每个项目各 5 万美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/American-Heart-Association-funds-research-to-assess-racial-bias-in-cardioangiography-treatment-algorithms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/American-Heart-Association-funds-research-to-assess-racial-bias-in-cardioangio-treatment-algorithms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6453291-bba5-411b-8dc7-b60b8d6afe03 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 22:12:32 -0400 American Heart Association funds research to assess racial bias in cardiovascular treatment algorithms
人际支持和社区资源可以帮助抑郁的母亲育儿当孩子的母亲经历抑郁症时，“举全村之力养育一个孩子”这句谚语就具有了新的意义。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Interpersonal-supports-and-community-resources-can-help-depressed-mothers-in-parenting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Interpersonal-supports-and-community-resources-can-help-depressed-mothers-in-parenting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5583f96a-e303-4e35-bbee-a29fe1d25689 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 22:00:54 -0400 Interpersonal supports and community resources can help depressed mothers in parenting
炎症减缓了血液中疟疾寄生虫的发育由彼得·多尔蒂感染与免疫研究所（Doherty Institute）和柯比研究所领导的研究发现，体内炎症可以减缓血液中疟疾寄生虫的发展——这一发现可能构成预防或限制疟原虫的潜在新策略。严重的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Inflammation-slows-down-the-development-of-malaria-parasites-in-bloodstream.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Inflammation-slows-down-the-development-of-malaria-parasites-in-bloodstream.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0299a534-058e-4052-a812-6fabd95180b0 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 21:48:19 -0400 Inflammation slows down the development of malaria parasites in bloodstream
NLRP3炎症小体在足细胞衰老中发挥作用一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 14 期，题为“Inhibiting NLRP3signaling in Ageing pod Theirs Improves Their Mythology”。寿命和健康寿命。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/NLRP3-inflammasome-plays-a-role-in-pod cell-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/NLRP3-inflammasome-plays-a-role-in-pod cell-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be57c734-3690-4384-8ea8-7e943ce155e1 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 21:42:54 -0400 NLRP3 inflammasome plays a role in podocyte aging
UTHealth 休斯顿获得 NIH 拨款，用于研究癫痫猝死的预防策略美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 国家神经疾病和中风研究所向 UTHealth Houston 提供了一项为期五年、价值 310 万美元的拨款，用于研究癫痫猝死 (SUDEP) 的预防策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/UTHealth-Houston-receives-NIH-grant-to-study-preventive-strategies-for-sudden-unexpected-death-in-epilepsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/UTHealth-Houston-receives-NIH-grant-to-study-preventive-strategies-for-sudden-unexpected-death-in-epilepsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f66512dd-bd47-409a-a96a-d2d87ea2b7c2 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 21:38:00 -0400 UTHealth Houston receives NIH grant to study preventive strategies for sudden unexpected death in epilepsy
研究发现骨髓增生异常综合征经常被误诊迈阿密大学米勒学院西尔维斯特综合癌症中心的研究人员表示，被称为骨髓增生异常综合征/肿瘤 (MDS) 的血液疾病很难诊断，而且经常被误诊，使患者面临治疗错误和其他潜在有害后果的风险增加医学和合作组织。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Myelodys Plastic-syndromes-are-commonly-misdiagnosed-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Myelodys Plastic-syndromes-are-commonly-misdiagnosed-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b22656b-acfc-4f8e-803b-d88b7042006c Tue, 08 Aug 2023 21:33:34 -0400 Myelodysplastic syndromes are commonly misdiagnosed, study finds
树突状细胞被发现可以杀死缺乏 CD47 的 T 细胞神户大学的研究人员发现了一种全新的、意想不到的机制，通过这种机制，免疫系统可以清除缺乏将其识别为小鼠自身一部分的分子的细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Dendritic-cells-found-to-kill-CD47-deficient-T-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Dendritic-cells-found-to-kill-CD47-deficient-T-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d7cad80-687d-4e40-99d1-56aadd5676aa Tue, 08 Aug 2023 15:35:25 -0400 Dendritic cells found to kill CD47-deficient T cells
新型神经调节方法可改善帕金森病患者的步态步态相关障碍会对帕金森病 (PD) 患者的生活质量产生不利影响，这种疾病影响着全球数百万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Novel-neuromodulation-approach-leads-to-gait-improvements-in-病人-with-Parkinsone28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Novel-neuromodulation-approach-leads-to-gait-improvements-in-病人-with-Parkinsone28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc51f6a6-e003-4834-b811-39c00746cec6 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 15:28:10 -0400 Novel neuromodulation approach leads to gait improvements in patients with Parkinson’s disease
